timeline.message: RM26144 Clarifying the field lineMinBeforeLongReportGenerationMessageNumber by updating help and traduction
RM26144 Clarifying the field lineMinBeforeLongReportGenerationMessageNumber by updating help and traduction

timeline.bodyText: Changing the key made the translation disappear.
timeline.author: ale-axelor
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1305,7 +1299,7 @@
 "Number Of Units On Supplier Invoices On Last 12 Month","Qtés produits achetés (facturés) sur 12 mois",,
 "Number of cheques","Nombre de chèques",,
 "Number of depreciation","Nombre d'amortissement",,
-"Number of line minimum before long report generation message appear","Nombre de lignes minimums avant que le message de génération du rapport long apparaisse",,
+"Number of lines minimum before long report generation message appears",,,

timeline.bodyText: Minimal number of line => Minimal number of lines
timeline.author: ale-axelor
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -159,7 +159,7 @@
 		<boolean name="isManagePFPInRefund" title="Manage PFP on supplier refunds"/>
 
 		<!-- Account Report -->
-		<integer name="lineMinBeforeLongReportGenerationMessageNumber" title="Number of line minimum before long report generation message appear" min="0" help="value 0 is equal to no message"  default="10000"/>
+		<integer name="lineMinBeforeLongReportGenerationMessageNumber" title="Number of lines minimum before long report generation message appears" min="0" help="Minimal number of line required to display a confirmation message when you try to export an accounting report. Value 0 is equal to no message"  default="10000"/>
